targets.query: SELECT moving_average(mean("value"), 6) FROM "HeartRate_Intraday" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
select mean_value from (SELECT mean("value") as mean_value FROM "HeartRate_Intraday" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)) where mean_value <= 96
select mean_value from (SELECT mean("value") as mean_value FROM "HeartRate_Intraday" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)) where mean_value > 96
select mean_value from (SELECT mean("value") as mean_value FROM "HeartRate_Intraday" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)) where mean_value < 60
select mean_value from (SELECT mean("value") as mean_value FROM "HeartRate_Intraday" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)) where mean_value > 110
SELECT moving_average(mean("value"), 6) FROM "Steps_Intraday" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sleep_type FROM sleep_levels WHERE short = false
SELECT sleep_type FROM sleep_levels WHERE short = false
SELECT distinct("minutes_deep") FROM "sleep" WHERE is_main_sleep = true AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("minutes_deep") FROM "sleep" WHERE is_main_sleep = true AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("minutes_deep") FROM "sleep" WHERE is_main_sleep = true AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT distinct("minutes_deep") FROM "sleep" WHERE is_main_sleep = true AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("minutes_deep") FROM "sleep" WHERE is_main_sleep = true AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("minutes_deep") FROM "sleep" WHERE is_main_sleep = true AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT distinct("minutes_deep") FROM "sleep" WHERE is_main_sleep = true AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT median("level") FROM "Sleep Levels" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "Steps" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d, ) fill(null)
SELECT mean(value) FROM "heartrate" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(2m) fill(0)
SELECT "duration" FROM "Activity Records" WHERE ("ActivityName" = 'Walk') AND $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC
SELECT "calories" FROM "Activity Records" WHERE ("ActivityName" = 'Walk')
SELECT "calories" FROM "Activity Records" WHERE ("ActivityName" = 'Walk')

SELECT "lat", "long" 
FROM "GPS" 
WHERE "ActivityID"::tag = '$ActivityGPS' 
AND $timeFilter
SELECT time FROM "DeviceBatteryLevel" WHERE DERIVATIVE("value", 1s) > 0

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "GPS" WITH KEY = "ActivityID" WHERE $timeFilter
